quotes.quote: Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: That's the secret to life... replace one worry with another....
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Worries go down better with soup than without.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Worry a little bit every day and in a lifetime you will lose a couple of years. If something is wrong, fix it if you can. But train yourself not to worry. Worry never fixes anything.
quotes.author: Mary Hemingway

quotes.quote: It is generally true that, the more preparations one has for an event, the more inconveniently fast the event will occur.
quotes.author: Shantideva

quotes.quote: If you can solve your problem, then what is the need of worrying? If you cannot solve it, then what is the use of worrying?
quotes.author: Susan Jeffers

quotes.quote: We have been taught to believe that negative equals realistic and positive equals unrealistic.
